descriptionHtml:
KenUI will be a complete overhaul of the Skyrim UI both graphically and technically. My inspiration will be the Oblivion menu, with its old paper parchment and medieval symbols.

---

## Installation ##
Place \'loadingmenu.swf\' in [Skyrim installation folder]/Data/Interface

## Uninstallation ##
Simply remove the file!

---

Preview includes:
- Loading screen (added time, graphical overhaul)

To-do:
- Barter menu
- Console
- Container menu
- Crafting menu
- Credits menu (adding KenUI credits)
- Cursor (\'Enhanced\' from my cursor mod)
- Dialogue menu (next up)
- Favorites menu
- Gift menu
- Inventory menu
- Level up menu
- Lockpicking menu
- Magic menu
- Map menu
- Map (technical)
- Message box (technical)
- Shared components (technical)
- Sleep/wait menu
- Start menu (titlescreen)
- Stats menu
- Titles (prologue text)
- Training menu
- Tween menu (technical)
- Widget overlay (technical)

---

Enjoy :)

Mod by:
Kenney Vleugels
www.kenney.nl
author: Kenney
